cell.html: Animator-Poznań Festival, the first edition of which coincides with the Year of Polish Animation, is to become the major animation festival in Poland, competing with the most prestigious festivals in the world. A special emphasis on the connections between animation and music is a unique characteristic of ANIMATOR.

cell.html: ekotopfilm - International Festival of Sustainable Development Films

cell.html: The program of the Festival focuses on all branches of economic, industrial and human activity stressing the need for sustainable development to be a continuous process, in which all inhabitants should take part.Held annually in October. Free Entry.
